name: Ojas Innovative Technologies Pvt Ltd
description: Ojas is a Cost Effective IT Services Company with 12 years of rich experience in serving its customers with a team of 700+ IT Professionals. We’re one of the fastest growing companies in India providing Services in Application Dev & Support, Identity Governance, Testing Services, Mobile Dev & Testing, Staff Augmentation and Staffing Services to our customers. We offer our services from our ODC in Hyderabad, India and cater to US, Canada and Australia.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: Cost Effective IT Services Provider
ShortDescription: Ojas is a Cost Effective IT Services Company with 12 years of rich experience in serving its customers with a team of 700+ IT Professionals.
enhanced_description: Ojas Innovative Technologies Pvt Ltd is a cost-effective IT services company with over 12 years of experience and a team of 700+ IT professionals. Based in Hyderabad, India, Ojas provides a range of services from its Offshore Development Center (ODC), including Application Development & Support, Identity Governance, Testing Services, Mobile Development & Testing, Staff Augmentation, and Staffing Services. Catering to customers in the US, Canada, and Australia, Ojas also offers solutions related to HR software and machine learning for HR, specifically aimed at accelerating skill development and learning efficiency.
key_use_cases: Outsourced application development and ongoing support
Third-party software testing and quality assurance
Implementation and management of identity governance solutions
Providing expert IT professionals for short-term or long-term projects (staff augmentation)
Full-cycle recruitment and placement of IT talent (staffing services)
Leveraging technology for HR software initiatives, including machine learning applications for HR
Supporting organizational goals related to skill development and learning efficiency
competitive_advantages: Large pool of IT professionals (700+ team)
Rapid growth in the Indian market
Global service delivery capability (US, Canada, Australia)
implementation_scenarios: Outsourced project development and delivery through their Offshore Development Center (ODC)
Augmenting existing client IT teams with specialized skills and additional capacity
Providing complete staffing solutions for specific roles or projects
Consulting and development of HR-focused software and technology solutions
hr_functions_supported: Learning & Development (Skill Development and Learning Efficiency initiatives)
roi_benefits: Cost reduction through offshore and cost-effective service delivery
Increased efficiency in IT operations and project delivery
Access to a large pool of experienced IT talent and specialized skills
Accelerated project timelines due to external expertise and resources
Improved organizational capability through enhanced skill development and learning
primary_users: Organizations seeking IT development, support, or testing services
scalability_features: Scalable workforce solutions through staff augmentation and staffing services
Large team of IT professionals (700+) available for project scaling and new engagements
